name: Break Point
storyline:
Break Point follows Ethan, a shy university student, as he steps out of his comfort zone and into the billiards room at the urging of his friend, Chris. Nervous but eager to try something new, Ethan meets Sakura, a skilled and patient player who offers him guidance after his clumsy first attempts. Their dynamic quickly evolves as Sakura teaches him the fundamentals of the game, and they form a bond through their shared practice sessions.

When a doubles tournament is announced, Sakura asks Ethan to partner with her, recognizing his potential despite his inexperience. Together, they train rigorously, building trust and synergy both on and off the table. During the tournament, their teamwork is put to the test, culminating in a narrow but thrilling victory.
summary: Break Point is a heartwarming story of growth, friendship, and taking chances, showcasing how shared passions can create unexpected and meaningful connections.
